statements: SELECT * FROM livestock_management
SELECT id, animal_name FROM livestock_management
SELECT health_status, breeding_information FROM livestock_management
SELECT * FROM livestock_management WHERE id = 1
SELECT animal_name, breeding_information FROM livestock_management WHERE health_status = 'Healthy'
SELECT id, animal_name, health_status, breeding_information FROM livestock_management WHERE health_status='Healthy';
SELECT * FROM livestock_management WHERE health_status='Sick' ORDER BY animal_name DESC;
SELECT animal_name, breeding_information FROM livestock_management WHERE breeding_information LIKE '%pregnant%' ORDER BY animal_name ASC;
SELECT id, health_status FROM livestock_management WHERE health_status='Injured' OR health_status='Sick';
SELECT * FROM livestock_management WHERE breeding_information IS NOT NULL AND health_status='Healthy';
SELECT * FROM LivestockHealthRecords;
SELECT health_status, medication FROM LivestockHealthRecords WHERE id = 1;
SELECT animal_id, health_status FROM LivestockHealthRecords WHERE health_status = 'Good';
SELECT id, health_status FROM LivestockHealthRecords ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT breeding_status, breeding_date FROM BreedingInformation WHERE animal_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM LivestockHealthRecords WHERE health_status='Sick';
SELECT animal_id, medication FROM LivestockHealthRecords WHERE health_status='Healthy' ORDER BY animal_id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM BreedingInformation;
SELECT animal_id, breeding_status FROM BreedingInformation WHERE breeding_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY breeding_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM LivestockHealthRecords LEFT JOIN BreedingInformation ON LivestockHealthRecords.animal_id = BreedingInformation.animal_id;
SELECT * FROM livestock_health_records WHERE health_condition = 'Healthy';
SELECT animal_id, vaccination_date FROM livestock_health_records WHERE weight >= 100;
SELECT birth_date, birth_weight FROM breeding_information ORDER BY birth_date DESC;
SELECT animal_id, sire_id, dam_id FROM breeding_information WHERE birth_weight BETWEEN 5.5 AND 7.5;
SELECT * FROM animals WHERE animal_type = 'Cow' AND breed = 'Holstein';
SELECT * FROM livestock_health_records WHERE weight > 100 ORDER BY vaccination_date DESC;
SELECT animal_id, health_condition FROM livestock_health_records WHERE health_condition = 'Good' ORDER BY animal_id;
SELECT animal_id, breed, birth_date FROM animals WHERE birth_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01' ORDER BY animal_id;
SELECT animal_type, breed, owner FROM animals JOIN breeding_information ON animals.id = breeding_information.animal_id WHERE sire_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY breed DESC;
SELECT id, health_condition, vaccination_date FROM livestock_health_records WHERE weight < 50 OR health_condition = 'Poor' ORDER BY vaccination_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM HealthRecords;
SELECT animal_id, temperature, weight FROM HealthRecords WHERE temperature > 100;
SELECT animal_id, animal_name FROM Animals WHERE animal_type = 'Dog';
SELECT breeding_id, breeding_date, location FROM BreedingInformation ORDER BY breeding_date DESC;
SELECT animal_name, gender, birth_date FROM Animals WHERE birth_date >= '2020-01-01';
SELECT * FROM HealthRecords WHERE temperature > 38.5;
SELECT animal_name, birth_date FROM Animals ORDER BY birth_date DESC;
SELECT animal_name, gender FROM Animals WHERE animal_type='Dog';
SELECT * FROM BreedingInformation WHERE breeding_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT farm_name, farm_location FROM Farms WHERE area_acres > 50;
SELECT * FROM Livestock;
SELECT animal_type, health_status FROM Livestock WHERE weight > 100;
SELECT livestock_id, dob, weight FROM Livestock WHERE animal_type = 'Cow';
SELECT breeding_date, offspring_count FROM Breeding ORDER BY breeding_date DESC;
SELECT farm_location, farm_size FROM Farm WHERE farm_manager_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Livestock WHERE animal_type = 'Cow'
SELECT livestock_id, health_status FROM Livestock WHERE dob > '2020-01-01' ORDER BY weight DESC
SELECT f.farmer_name, f.farm_location, fr.contact_number FROM Farmers f JOIN Farm fr ON f.farmer_id = fr.farm_manager_id

SELECT l.livestock_id, b.breeding_date, h.health_condition FROM Livestock l JOIN Breeding b ON l.livestock_id = b.livestock_id JOIN HealthRecords h ON l.livestock_id = h.livestock_id WHERE h.treatment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT * FROM Breeding WHERE mate_id IS NULL
